comments.comment: Aiyooo me salli walata rata beragattha kiyapu ubalath yata unane. Yako uthopi army ekata giye rata gena hithala newei bada gena hithala. Denuth ekamai karanne. Army eke thibba winaya ko yako. Salli walata ratak thamage daruwoth pawala dena sakkili ban ubala.

replies.replyComment: Ponnaya ube mahanuwara. Dala erapan ammage puke...
Keriyata gedara ta evilla tiyanne... Oluwa kudu wenna.
Koheda huttige puta uba inne.... Gon... Wesige puta.... Niyama sinhala.... Toge sinhala kama gahaganin rol karala puke......
Denagan pakaya...toge ammage ahaganin... Itihasaya..... Pake mahanuwara..... Topita watakarala  hambayo gehuwe.... G gihin hitiye topita...
Topi gotabaya ge chanda kadanna sewala huttige putala...
Ara tope inne malwatu kaalakanniya... Uta kiyapiya UNP ekata puka denna kiyala....
Gon wesige puta.... Rata gena katakaranna issella... Ponnaya ube  jatiwadaya nawatta ganin...
Ponnaya ewapan bodu govi pennanna.... Arinawa puke diviyaloke penna... Ube ammatai, tattata, ubatai ekata tiyala.
Keri ponnaya bodu govi... Ube ammage hutti, ube tattage paiyai bodu govida... Ane pako... Ube ammata puke erawanne saharange ekekta kiyala.
Tope mahanuwara inne ara malwatu, asgiri, kiyapiya unta gihin.... Rata pawala denna epa kiyala.... Un ahinsaka minissu ge salli walin sepa vidinne
Ponnayo hukagannetuwa hitapan.... Pake kata netiwa.... Tota arinawa puke mahanuwara Town eke tiyala...
@Asanka De Silva dan ubala suddata puka denawa.
Maha nuwara tamai... Suddata pawala dunneüêíüêí
